mapper.insert: insert into sys_role_menu (role_code, menu_code, role_name, menu_name, view_or_not, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{viewOrNot,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sys_role_menu set role_name = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, view_or_not = #{viewOrNot,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where role_code = #{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and menu_code = #{menuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select role_code, menu_code, role_name, menu_name, view_or_not, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_role_menu

select role_code, role_name, menu_code,menu_name,view_or_not, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_role_menu where 1=1 and role_code = #{roleCode} and rec_stat = '0';
